description: If you feel like your exoskeleton is getting too tight, you may choose to shed it. Doing so will produce chitin chunks, useful for crafting. Activate to shed your carapace.

spawn_item.message: You shed your old exoskeleton. You are feeling fresh.

description: You have a fin-like tail.  It allows you to swim more quickly, but prevents wearing non-fabric pants.  Slightly increases wet benefits.
You have a long, graceful tail, like that of a big cat.  It improves your balance, making your ability to dodge higher, but prevents wearing non-fabric pants.

You have a long tail with a tuft on the end.  You find yourself instinctively swatting away flies with it, though it's not as effective at balancing you as you'd like.  Prevents wearing non-fabric pants.
You have a long but hairless tail.  It's a pretty effective balancing aid, but does look, uh, ratty.  Prevents wearing non-fabric pants.
You have a long, thick, lizardlike tail.  It helps you balance a bit but also makes a serviceable whip.  Prevents wearing non-fabric pants.
You have a long and semi-stiff lizardlike tail.  You can't effectively lash it in combat, but it significantly improves your balance.  Prevents wearing non-fabric pants.
You have a long, fluffy-furred tail.  It greatly improves your balance, making your ability to dodge much higher.  Prevents wearing non-fabric pants.
You have a long tail that ends in a vicious stinger, like that of a scorpion.  It does not improve your balance at all, but allows for a powerful piercing attack.  Prevents wearing non-fabric pants.
You have a long tail that ends in a heavy, bony club.  It does not improve your balance at all, but allows for a powerful bashing attack.  Prevents wearing non-fabric pants.
Your eyes bulge out several inches from your skull.  This does not affect your vision in any way.
You smell awful.  Monsters that track scent will find you very easily, and humans will react poorly.
Your muscle response is dependent on ambient temperatures.  You lose 1% of your speed for every 5 (2.8) degrees below 65 F (18.3 C).  This sluggishness helps you conserve energy, however.
You're hideously deformed.  Some people will have a strong negative reaction to your appearance.
You heal faster when sleeping and will even recover small amount of HP when not sleeping.
There's something about you that creatures find frightening, and they are more likely to try to flee.
Ugh, out of water already?  You need about twice the fluids of an average human.
You've grown a set of gills in your neck, allowing you to breathe underwater.  Slightly increases wet benefits.
You make more noise while walking.  You're also more likely to set off traps.

You've grown a chitin exoskeleton made of thick, stiff plates.  It provides excellent physical protection, but reduces your dexterity by 1 and encumbers all body parts but your eyes and mouth.  Greatly reduces wet effects.

Your body is covered with a thick, impenetrable red carapace. It provides unmatched physical protection and even some protection from corrosive chemicals, but reduces your dexterity by 3 and severely encumbers all body parts but your eyes.  Greatly reduces wet effects.
Your muscles are much stronger.  Strength + 4
Your guts have developed the ability to handle poisonous food.  Mostly.
//: Yes, you eventually got over the massive digestive upset.  Mutations aren't easy on a system!

description: Eating rotting, long-dead flesh is good for the struggle, and safe--if still completely unappealing--for you.
You can survive injuries that would incapacitate humans: you get a 20% bonus to all hit points.  Stacks with Tough, etc.
Not much scares you.  You get a 30% bonus to all hit points.  Stacks with Tough, etc.
Your cardiovascular system has caught up with your muscular physique, so who needs pathetic human cars?  Strength +4.
Instead of your right hand, you now have a giant crab claw. It encumbers you greatly, but you can occasionally use it in melee combat to deal massive damage.

attacks.attack_text_u: You pinch %s with your giant claw

description: You have grown noticeably taller and broader.  Much of it is useful muscle mass (Strength +2), but you find it throws off your balance and you get in your own way (+10 torso and arm encumbrance).
You carry your rugged body with the dignity you deserve.  Strength +2.

You have grown even more massive, to the point where you cannot usefully fit into human-sized clothing or vehicles.  Much of it is powerful muscle mass (Strength +4), but it's a real pain to haul around.
Who needs skin when you can have a carapace?
Who needssss legssss anyway?
You are so adorable!
A set of flexible green scales has grown to cover your body, acting as natural armor.  Somewhat reduces wet effects.
You have a flattened nose and thin slits for nostrils, giving you a lizard-like appearance.  This makes breathing slightly difficult and increases mouth encumbrance by 10.
Your eyes have mutated, with a brilliant iris and slitted pupil similar to that of a lizard.  This is visually striking, but doesn't seem to affect your vision.
You have grown two extra sets of eyes on your forehead. This improves your perception by 2, though other survivors may react badly.
You have no qualms about bending the truth, and have practically no tells.  Telling lies and otherwise bluffing will be much easier for you.
You are cold-blooded and rely on heat to keep moving.  Your lose 1% of your speed for every 2 (1.1) degrees below 65 F (18.3 C), but only need to eat about half as much as before.
Your body has become permanently cold-blooded.  Your speed lowers--or raises--for every 2 (1.1) degrees below or above 65 F (18.3 C).  You only need to eat half as much as an average human.
You have a short, stubby tail.  It serves no purpose.
You can sense things you never imagined.  Perception + 7
Your hearing is poor, and you may not hear quiet or far-off noises.
You simply can not carry as much as people with a similar strength could.  Your maximum weight carried is reduced by 35%.
You're skilled at clearing obstacles; terrain like railings or counters are as easy for you to move on as solid ground.
Your optic nerves and brain have mutated to catch up with your eyes, allowing you to see in the infrared spectrum.
You hiss when speaking.  Persuading NPCs will be more difficult, but threatening them will be easier.
A set of very flexible and slick scales has grown to cover your body.  These act as weak natural armor, improve your ability to swim, and make you difficult to grab.  Mostly reduces wet effects.
Your teeth have grown into two-inch-long fangs, allowing you to make an extra attack when conditions favor it.
Your body's ability to digest fruits, vegetables and grains is severely hampered.  You cannot eat anything besides meat.
Your system is rather tolerant of poisons and toxins, and most will affect you less.
Your body produces a potent venom.  Cutting or stabbing attacks from mutations have a chance to poison your target.
Your venom has become particularly strong.  You're confident that your bites or other cutting/stabbing natural attacks will take your target down quickly.
Your tongue is forked, like that of a reptile.  This has no effect.
You are a little weaker.  Strength - 1
You are weaker.  Strength -2
You are nimbler.  Dexterity + 2
You are nimble and quick.  Dexterity + 4
Your teeth have grown into two-inch-long fangs, perfect for injecting venom. They allow you to make extra attacks when your mouth is uncovered.
Your legs are badly deformed. Permanent leg encumbrance.

A massive serpentine tail extends for some body lengths behind you, and your legs and feet transformed into useless stumps, hanging off your sides. You can use your tail to crush your enemies, when conditions favor it. Prevents wearing pants and footgear.
You know how to move completely silently.

You've had a revelation: by killing the weaker creatures, who would only die anyway, you preserve resources for those better able to survive.  You are less bothered by death of others: their own weakness invited these fates upon them.

Your brain has a lot more in common with predatory animal than a human, making it easier to control misplaced reactions to death of your prey.  Additionally, combat skills, which you use to hunt, are easier to learn and maintain.

You consider yourself something other than human and no longer empathize with them.  Combat skills are easy to learn and maintain, but your critical thinking, so characteristic to these creatures, suffers.
The hairless apes are as good eating as any other meat.
Your neck is unusually elongated.  This has no effect.
Your head can't take much abuse.  Its maximum HP is 20% lower than usual.
You have a hood on your neck, like a cobra's. It looks striking, but makes you better at intimidating. Adds a slight head encumbrance.
Your hearing is better than average, and you can hear distant sounds more easily.
You're just generally quick!  You get a 10% bonus to action points.
You make less noise while walking.  You're also less likely to set off traps.
Your ears are huge!  They're rather fascinating, and help you hear from a much greater distance.
Your skin is slightly rough.  This has no gameplay effect.
You've got an incredibly soft fur, and it's very pleasant to touch. It provides some protection from cold, and makes persuading other survivors easier.
You have a set of prominent rodent-like whiskers around your mouth.  These make you more aware of vibrations in the air, and improve your ability to dodge slightly.
You're a real head-turner.  Some people will react well to your appearance, and most people have an easier time trusting you.

You need about twice as much food as the average human to maintain your expanded cardiovascular and respiratory systems.  On a plus side, it doesn't take you much time to recover from any strenuous activity.
Natural animals like dogs and wolves see you as prey, and are liable to attack you on sight.

Whether due to exercise and good diet, or due to a natural propensity to physical endurance, you tire due to physical exertion much less readily than others.  Your maximum stamina is 25% higher than usual.
You have a hard time remembering things.  Your skills will erode slightly faster than usual, and you can remember less terrain.
The bottoms of your feet are strongly padded.  You receive no movement penalty for not wearing shoes, and even receive a 10% bonus when moving barefoot.
Your feet have grown really big, and look exactly like a rabbit's. Prevents wearing shoes.
You have grown large, curved, and wickedly sharp talons in place of your big toes.  Fortunately, they don't get in the way of your movement.  Unfortunately, they do prevent you from wearing footgear.

Your feet have fused into hooves.  This allows kicking attacks to do much more damage, provides natural armor, and removes the need to wear shoes; however, you can not wear shoes of any kind.  Reduces wet effects.
Your toes have grown wriggly, and you can't imagine why you wear that stuff on your feet.  Take it off.  It's in the way.

//~: The idea is that you, for lack of a better term, plant yourself.  Crafting and digging don't count because they presume a certain amount of movement during the task.  The handheld game does count.
description: It's about time you started developing a root system.  When reading, fishing from, waiting, or otherwise being stationary for a while on diggable terrain, you'll extract nutrients and water from the soil.
You find it difficult not to sink roots when able.  You extract nutrients and water whenever on diggable terrain, but move more slowly.
Your legs have transformed into six tentacles.  This decreases your speed on land by 20%, makes your movement silent, increases your swimming speed, and reduces wet penalties.
Your senses are keener.  Perception + 2
You are not too bright, and you get distracted easily. Intelligence - 2
Your big teeth have grown in.  Folks had best show some more respect.

attacks.attack_text_u: You bite into %s with your incisors

description: Your digestive system is capable of digesting cellulose and other rough plant material.  You can eat underbrush by activating this, standing over your target, and pressing E.
You're accustomed to eating plants directly, and can get nutrition from grass as well as underbrush.  Eat either one by activating this, standing over your target, and pressing E.
Nothing gets you down!  You savor the joys of life, ignore its hardships, and are generally happier than most people.
Your legs are extremely limber and fast-moving.  You move 30% faster on flat surfaces.
Your body's efficiency is like that of a tiny furnace, increasing your maximum stamina by 40%.
During moments of great stress or under the effects of stimulants, you may find your hands shaking uncontrollably, severely reducing your dexterity.
